mapper.select: select case when nvl(category_no_ref, 0) = 0 then 'main' else '' end as "cate_col1", case when nvl(category_no_ref, 0) = 0 then category_name else '' end as "cate_col2", case when nvl(category_no_ref, 0) = 0 then '' else 'sub' end as "cate_col3", case when nvl(category_no_ref, 0) = 0 then '' else category_name end as "cate_col4", category_no from category c start with category_no_ref is null connect by category_no_ref = prior category_no order siblings by category_no
